channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Responsive video embed
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Responsive video embed

item.title: CVE-2024-5475|2024-06-20T06:00:03.582Z -- unknown -- responsive%20video%20embed
item.description: The Responsive video embed WordPress plugin before 0.5.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
